apis.description: Returns a paginated list of students selected for moderation

operations.notes: Returns a paginated list of students selected for moderation

apis.description: Returns an array of users that were selected for moderation

operations.notes: Returns an array of users that were selected for moderation

parameters.name: student_ids
parameters.description: user ids for students to select for moderation

apis.description: Tell whether the student's submission needs one or more provisional grades.

operations.summary: Show provisional grade status for a student
operations.notes: Tell whether the student's submission needs one or more provisional grades.

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: The id of the student to show the status for

apis.description:
Choose which provisional grade the student should receive for a submission.
The caller must have :moderate_grades rights.

operations.notes:
Choose which provisional grade the student should receive for a submission.
The caller must have :moderate_grades rights.

apis.description:
Given a provisional grade, copy the grade (and associated submission comments and rubric assessments)
to a "final" mark which can be edited or commented upon by a moderator prior to publication of grades.

Notes:
* The student must be in the moderation set for the assignment.
* The newly created grade will be selected.
* The caller must have "Moderate Grades" rights in the course.

operations.notes:
Given a provisional grade, copy the grade (and associated submission comments and rubric assessments)
to a "final" mark which can be edited or commented upon by a moderator prior to publication of grades.

Notes:
* The student must be in the moderation set for the assignment.
* The newly created grade will be selected.
* The caller must have "Moderate Grades" rights in the course.

apis.description:
Publish the selected provisional grade for all submissions to an assignment.
Use the "Select provisional grade" endpoint to choose which provisional grade to publish
for a particular submission.

Students not in the moderation set will have their one and only provisional grade published.

WARNING: This is irreversible. This will overwrite existing grades in the gradebook.

operations.summary: Publish provisional grades for an assignment
operations.notes:
Publish the selected provisional grade for all submissions to an assignment.
Use the "Select provisional grade" endpoint to choose which provisional grade to publish
for a particular submission.

Students not in the moderation set will have their one and only provisional grade published.

WARNING: This is irreversible. This will overwrite existing grades in the gradebook.

provisional_grade_id.description: The identifier for the provisional grade

grade_matches_current_submission.description: Whether the grade was applied to the most current submission (false if the student resubmitted after grading)

final.description: Whether this is the 'final' provisional grade created by the moderator

speedgrader_url.description: A link to view this provisional grade in SpeedGraderâ„¢
